column4: Hello all, I have two computers and one backup hard drive.  What is the best way to sync files between all of them.  Im looking for a GUI (maybe based on rsync?)
the best solution I have found is to run rsync on a schedule. Depends on your window and how much needs compared and transfered
and MestreLion thanks for the suggestions
and MestreLion will rsync keep everything synced even if something is uploaded to one or the other, will it consolidate changes?
